lead_paragraph: The political performance art known as the Stephen Colbert campaign for president came a step closer to reality last night on “The Colbert Report” on Comedy Central, as Mr. Colbert transferred control of his “super PAC” — Americans for a Better Tomorrow, Tomorrow – to his friend and late-night lead-in Jon Stewart, Brian Stelter reported. Mr. Colbert’s lawyer explained: “You cannot be a candidate and run a super PAC. That would be coordinating with yourself.” Having a good friend run it, however, would be a different story, he said.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Colbert for President? and iPhone Riots in China
